Description: Aided in locating flaws and fixing already-in-use services which improved efficiency by 30%
Work on multiple applications such as lending platform and referral system which helped in the increase of customers.
Worked on handling on-chain transaction verification which helped in securing the platforms.
Developed an automatic post generation and editor for posts using ReactJS and Django.
Worked on multiple SDK integrations which allowed users to have a seamless experience on the platform.
Worked on bug fixes and improvements.
Developed a chat service using socket.io, node.js, and express and provide end-to-end encrypted communication. It can have 20 users per room or one on one interaction as well.
Contributed to a developer documentation website for the easier onboarding of future contributors resulting in 50% faster understanding of the app.
Strengthened ML models that analyzed daily data and gave an analysis of the data and predicted future outcomes using ARIMA, GARCH, and Regression algorithms.
Refined data visualization and provide an easier-to-understand dashboard to users.
